indiya polisiyata labunu thorathurakata anuwa sidukala watalimaka di athadanguwata gath mema sakakaruwan athara shri lankikayeku da wana bawa wartha weyi.eeta amatharawa athadanguwata gath sakakaruwangen dedeneku chennayi hi padinchikaruwan bawata me dakwa sidukala parikshanawala di awanaranaya karagena thibena athara anek pudgalaya ongolhi padinchikaruweki.mema jawaramkaruwan wisin shri lankikayin 6 deneku ostreliyawata muhudu margayen yawima sandaha salasum kara thibu athara ee sambandhayen thorathuru rasak anawaranaya karagena thibena bawata indiya polisiya prakashakara atha.indiyawe sita bhanda prawahanaya karana naukawakin ostreliyawata pitath kara harina bawata jawaramkaruwan wisin danum di thibena athara ee wenuwen adala pudgalayingen indiyanu rupiyal laksha pahaka mudalak labagena thibe.ostreliyawata yawima sandaha sudanamin siti shri lankikayin haya dena guwan mangin nithyanukulawa indiyawata pamina athi athara sathiyaka pamana kalayak indiyawe randi sita athi bawada wartha weyi.kese wuwada me siddhiya sambandhayen wadidura parikshana aarambhakara atha.
